notesStmt.note: "The papers that passed between the Commissioners appointed by His Majestie for the alteration of the Common prayer, &c." (caption title) has separate pagination and register beginning with quire Â² B.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and Harvard University, Library.
Appears on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 1822 (Harvard Library copy), and on UMI microfilm "Thomason Tracts" reel 162 (British Library copy).
